summary: Re-textured Septim created for Skyrim. The Dragonborn Coin!
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn Coin

Due to requests, I have created several versions of this coin.
So far the available versions are:

- Gold (Pristine, Dirty, Xtra Dirty)
- Silver (Pristine, Dirty, Xtra Dirty)

** Base textures when installed is the Gold Dirty version **

Hope someone out there will enjoy this as much as I did creating it.

Aside from the Dragons on the rear of the coin and the Skyrim Logo
which is a simple trace then beveled in Photoshop, the coin is
crafted from the ground up. No pre-made textures, brushes, etc..
were used, all created using various things such as render clouds,
etc..

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation:
-------------

Extract the Textures and Meshes folders from this archive to your
Path_To\\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder.


Base install is Gold Dirty version. If you want an alternate version
browse the archive and extract the texture folder for your desired
version to the Skyrim Data folder choosing yes to overwrite.

** Be sure to install base first so you do not end up missing other
textures that are not included in the alternates folders. **

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall:
----------

Delete files coin01.dds, coin01_n.dds, coin01_e.dds, coin01_w.dds
from Path_To\\Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Crypton\\Misc\\ folder.

Delete file coin01.nif from Path_To\\Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\clutter\\
folder.
author: Crypton

files.name: Dragonborn Coin 2 point 2
files.changelogHtml:
